item.title: Exciting News!
item.description: We're thrilled to announce that the first science paper to make use of TipTop has been accepted for publication in MNRAS! It is now available on arXiv!
item.content:encoded:
We're thrilled to announce that the first science paper to make use of TipTop has been accepted for publication in MNRAS! It is now available on arXiv!

INSPIRE: INvestigating Stellar Populations In RElics. IX.
KiDS J0842+0059: the first fully confirmed relic beyond the local Universe

Autors: C. Tortora, G. Tozzi, G. Agapito, F. La Barbera, C. Spiniello, R. Li, G. Carlà, G. D'Ago, E. Ghose, F. Mannucci, N. R. Napolitano, E. Pinna, M. Arnaboldi, D. Bevacqua, A. Ferré-Mateu, A. Gallazzi, J. Hartke, L. K. Hunt, M. Maksymowicz-Maciata, C. Pulsoni, P. Saracco, D. Scognamiglio, M. Spavone

This milestone marks an important step for the Astro-TipTop team as we continue to advance research and share our tools with the community. Stay tuned for more updates and publications!

item.title: Welcome to the Astro-TipTop Blog!
item.description: We're excited to launch the Astro-TipTop blog! Here we’ll share insights, release notes, research updates, and the latest publications from our team.
item.content:encoded: We're excited to launch the Astro-TipTop blog! Here we’ll share insights, release notes, research updates, and the latest publications from our team.
